local Tool = script.Parent local enabled = true local reload = 15 local detonateTime = 10 local radius = 50 local debris = game:GetService("Debris") local bomb = nil local children = {} local humanoid = nil local sphereOut = nil
function onActivated()
if not enabled then return end
enabled = false
print("clicked")
local t = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso",false)
humanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - Tool.Parent.Head.Position).unit
dropBomb(t)
bombEffect()
blackHole()
wait(reload)
Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0
enabled = true
end
function bombEffect()
sphereOut = Instance.new("Part") local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") mesh.MeshType = 3 mesh.Parent = sphereOut sphereOut.Material = Enum.Material.Foil sphereOut.BottomSurface = 0 sphereOut.TopSurface = 0 sphereOut.BackSurface = 0 sphereOut.FrontSurface = 0 sphereOut.LeftSurface = 0 sphereOut.RightSurface = 0 sphereOut.Size = Vector3.new(0,0,0) sphereOut.CanCollide = false sphereOut.Position = bomb.Position sphereOut.Anchored = true sphereOut.Transparency = 0.5 sphereOut.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(1,1,1) sphereOut.Parent = game.Workspace
local scaleSpeed = 2 local count = 0 while count < 5 do wait() sphereOut.Position = bomb.Position mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(mesh.Scale.x + scaleSpeed,mesh.Scale.y + scaleSpeed,mesh.Scale.z + scaleSpeed) bomb.smoke.Size = bomb.smoke.Size + scaleSpeed if mesh.Scale.x > radius * 2 then count = count + 1 if count ~= 5 then mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) bomb.smoke.Size = 0 sphereOut.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(1,1 - (count/4),1 - (count/4)) bomb.smoke.Color = Color3.new(1,1 - (count/4),1 - (count/4)) end end end
debris:AddItem(sphereOut,10)
end
function dropBomb(t)
bomb = Tool.Handle:clone() Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1 bomb.Name = "BlackHoleGenerator" bomb.CanCollide = true local unitVector = t.CFrame.lookVector.unit local addX = unitVector.x / (math.abs(unitVector.x) + math.abs(unitVector.z)) addX = addX * 4 local addZ = unitVector.z / (math.abs(unitVector.x) + math.abs(unitVector.z)) addZ = addZ * 4 bomb.Position = Vector3.new(t.Position.x + addX, t.Position.y, t.Position.z + addZ) bomb.Parent = game.Workspace
local sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles") sparkles.Parent = bomb sparkles.Color = Color3.new(50,0,0)
local smoke = Instance.new("Smoke") smoke.Name = "smoke" smoke.Size = 0 smoke.Color = Color3.new(1,1,1) smoke.Parent = bomb
bomb.TickTock:Play()
debris:AddItem(bomb, 18)
end
function blackHole()
children = {} recursiveGetChildren(game.Workspace)
bringPartsIn()
wait(9) bomb.GeneratingHole:Stop()
end
function bringPartsIn()
local bodyPos = Instance.new("BodyPosition") bomb.Anchored = true bodyPos.position = bomb.Position
bomb.TickTock:Stop() bomb.GeneratingHole:Play()
for i = 1, #children do
if (children[i].className == "Part") and (children[i].Anchored == false) and ((children[i].Position - bomb.Position).magnitude < radius) then local force = bodyPos:clone() force.P = children[i]:GetMass() * 2000 force.maxForce = Vector3.new(force.P, force.P, force.P) force.D = force.P *2 force.Parent = children[i] debris:AddItem(force, 10) end
end
end
function recursiveGetChildren(parent)
local kids = parent:GetChildren()
if kids ~= nil then for i =1, #kids do
table.insert(children,kids[i]) recursiveGetChildren(kids[i])
end end
end
function onEquipped()
if Tool.Handle.EquipSound.IsPlaying == false then Tool.Handle.EquipSound:Play() end
end
function onUnequipped()
Tool.Handle.EquipSound:Stop()
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
wait(1) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
